channel.title: CVE Feed for Splunk -- Splunk SOAR (On-premises)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Splunk -- Splunk SOAR (On-premises)

item.title: CVE-2023-3997|2024-07-01T16:57:46.531Z -- splunk -- splunk%20soar%20%28on-premises%29
item.description: Splunk SOAR versions lower than 6.1.0 are indirectly affected by a potential vulnerability accessed through the user’s terminal. A third party can send Splunk SOAR a maliciously crafted web request containing special ANSI characters to cause log file poisoning. When a terminal user attempts to view the poisoned logs, this can tamper with the terminal and cause possible malicious code execution from the terminal user’s action.
